passage.title: Frederick Honllingsworth
passage.paragraph: Tom and Fred are in the same class in their school. One day they have a fight in class. Their teacher is angry and let them write their names a hundred times.
After school, Tom and Fred stay in the classroom with the teacher. But Fred begins to cry. The teacher asks him, "Why are you crying, Fred?"
"Because his name is Tom May, and my name is very, very long. My name is Frederick Honllingsworth," says Fred.
